name: render_domain_model_scaffold
instructions: Generate source code scaffold files in the src directory based on the domain_concepts from story-graph.json. Extract domain_concepts from all epics and sub_epics in story-graph.json. Create actual source code files (Python .py files, TypeScript .ts files, or appropriate language files) for each bounded context and aggregate. Note: This is currently a placeholder - no builder or template is specified.
